openstack_networking_qos_bandwidth_limit.description: Manages a V2 Neutron QoS bandwidth limit rule resource within OpenStack.

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 Networking client.

qos_policy_id.description: The QoS policy reference. Changing this creates a new QoS bandwidth limit rule.
